AttributeType.name: backgroundColor
AttributeType.description: Sets the background color

AttributeType.name: borderColor
AttributeType.description: Sets the border color

AttributeType.name: borderStyle
AttributeType.description: Sets the border style

AttributeType.name: borderWidth
AttributeType.description: Sets the border width

AttributeType.name: color
AttributeType.description: Sets the color of the text

AttributeType.name: fontBold
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether the text is displayed in bold

AttributeType.name: fontItalic
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether the text is displayed in italic

AttributeType.name: fontName
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the font

AttributeType.name: fontOverline
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether a line is displayed above the text

AttributeType.name: fontSize
AttributeType.description: Sets the size of the font

AttributeType.name: fontStrikeout
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether a line is displayed over the text

AttributeType.name: fontUnderline
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether a line is displayed under the text

AttributeType.name: height
AttributeType.description: Sets the height of the element

AttributeType.name: left
AttributeType.description: Sets the left property

AttributeType.name: textWrap
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether the text wraps to the next line

AttributeType.description: Sets the top property

AttributeType.description: Sets the width of the element

AttributeType.name: action
AttributeType.description: Sets the MethodBinding representing the application action to invoke when this component is activated by the user. The expression must evaluate to a public method that takes no parameters, and returns a String (the logical outcome) which is passed to the NavigationHandler for this application

AttributeType.name: actionListener
AttributeType.description: Sets the MethodBinding representing an action listener method that will be notified when this component is activated by the user. The expression must evaluate to a public method that takes an ActionEvent parameter, with a return type of void

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: Sets the The value binding expression linking this component to a property in a backing bean

AttributeType.name: bottomPagerEnabled
AttributeType.description: Sets the boolean indicating whether the bottom pager is enabled or not

AttributeType.name: converter
AttributeType.description: Sets the Converter instance registered with this component.

AttributeType.name: customPagingEnabled
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether custom paging is enabled or not

AttributeType.name: customSortingEnabled
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether custom sorting is enabled or not

AttributeType.name: dataKeyName
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the field(s) that uniquely identify each record in the data source (use semi-colons to specify a composite primary key).

AttributeType.name: dataSource
AttributeType.description: Sets the data source this component is bound to

AttributeType.name: disabled
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether the component is disabled or not

AttributeType.name: expanded
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether the node is expanded or not

AttributeType.name: expandedIcon
AttributeType.description: Sets the url of the icon displayed next to an expanded node.

AttributeType.name: hoverStyle
AttributeType.description: Sets the hover style

AttributeType.name: hoverStyleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to the component when the mouse cursor is over it

AttributeType.name: href
AttributeType.description: Sets the href (url) to navigate to whenever the node is clicked-on. If both action and href are specified, href is used

AttributeType.name: icon
AttributeType.description: Sets the url of the default icon to display

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Sets the The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.

AttributeType.name: immediate
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating that, if this component is activated by the user, notifications should be delivered to interested listeners and actions immediately (that is, during Apply Request Values phase) rather than waiting until Invoke Application phase

AttributeType.name: itemCount
AttributeType.description: Sets the total number of items contained in the underlying dataModel (used when customPagingEnabled is set to true)

AttributeType.name: pageChangeListener
AttributeType.description: Sets the MethodBinding representing a pageChangeListener method that is notified of PageChangeEvent

AttributeType.name: pageSize
AttributeType.description: Sets the number of items to display on each page (0 means all items).

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: Sets the Flag indicating whether or not this component should be rendered (during Render Response Phase), or processed on any subsequent form submit.

AttributeType.name: selected
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether the node is selected or not

AttributeType.name: selectedStyle
AttributeType.description: Sets the Style applied to this node whenever selected

AttributeType.name: selectedStyleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to this node whenever selected

AttributeType.name: style
AttributeType.description: Sets the Style applied to the component

AttributeType.name: styleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to the component

AttributeType.name: tooltip
AttributeType.description: Sets the tooltip that is displayed whenever the mouse cursor is moving over the item

AttributeType.name: topPagerEnabled
AttributeType.description: Sets the boolean indicating whether the top pager is enabled or not

AttributeType.name: value
AttributeType.description: Sets the The current value of this component

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: Sets the The value binding expression linking this component to a property in a backing bean

AttributeType.name: bottomPagerEnabled
AttributeType.description: Sets the boolean indicating whether the bottom pager is enabled or not

AttributeType.name: customPagingEnabled
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether custom paging is enabled or not

AttributeType.name: customSortingEnabled
AttributeType.description: Sets the flag indicating whether custom sorting is enabled or not

AttributeType.name: dataKeyName
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the field(s) that uniquely identify each record in the data source (use semi-colons to specify a composite primary key).

AttributeType.name: dataSource
AttributeType.description: Sets the data source this component is bound to

AttributeType.name: expandedIcon
AttributeType.description: Sets the url of the icon displayed next to an expanded node. This value applies to all nodes and can also be overriden on a node basis

AttributeType.name: icon
AttributeType.description: Sets the url of the default icon displayed next to a node. This value applies to all children nodes and can also be overriden on a node basis

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Sets the The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.

AttributeType.name: itemCount
AttributeType.description: Sets the total number of items contained in the underlying dataModel (used when customPagingEnabled is set to true)

AttributeType.name: minusIcon
AttributeType.description: Sets the url of the icon that indicates that a node can be collapsed. This value applies to all children nodes and can also be overriden on a node basis

AttributeType.name: nodeHoverStyle
AttributeType.description: Sets the Style applied to a tree node when the mouse cursor is over it

AttributeType.name: nodeHoverStyleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to a tree node when the mouse cursor is over it

AttributeType.name: nodeSelectedStyle
AttributeType.description: Sets the Style applied to selected tree nodes

AttributeType.name: nodeSelectedStyleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to selected tree nodes

AttributeType.name: nodeStyle
AttributeType.description: Sets the default Style applied to tree nodes

AttributeType.name: nodeStyleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to tree nodes

AttributeType.name: pageChangeListener
AttributeType.description: Sets the MethodBinding representing a pageChangeListener method that is notified of PageChangeEvent

AttributeType.name: pageSize
AttributeType.description: Sets the number of items to display on each page (0 means all items).

AttributeType.name: plusIcon
AttributeType.description: Sets the url of the icon that indicates that a node can be expanded. This value applies to all children nodes and can also be overriden on a node basis

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: Sets the Flag indicating whether or not this component should be rendered (during Render Response Phase), or processed on any subsequent form submit.

AttributeType.name: style
AttributeType.description: Sets the default Style applied to the tree

AttributeType.name: styleClass
AttributeType.description: Sets the name of the css class applied to the tree

AttributeType.name: theme
AttributeType.description: Sets the preset look and feel applied to the component (Classic, None, WinXp)

AttributeType.name: topPagerEnabled
AttributeType.description: Sets the boolean indicating whether the top pager is enabled or not
